solution_line_template: There are {months_per_year} months in 1 year and his loan is for {loan_duration_years} years so that's {months_per_year}*{loan_duration_years} = <<{months_per_year}*{loan_duration_years}={total_months}>>{total_months} months

His monthly payment is ${monthly_payment} and he pays this for {total_months} months so his loan for the tractor was {monthly_payment}*{total_months} = $<<{monthly_payment}*{total_months}={total_financed_amount}>>{total_financed_amount}
